Columns.Description: Date and time the record was created.
Columns.Name: TimeGenerated

Columns.Description: Name of the server from the ServiceMapComputer_CL table.
Columns.Name: Computer

Columns.Description: Direction of the connection value is inbound or outbound
Columns.Name: Direction

Columns.Description: Unique identifier for the process in the ServiceMapProcess_CL table.
Columns.Name: ProcessName

Columns.Description: IP address of the source.
Columns.Name: SourceIp

Columns.Description: IP address of the destination.
Columns.Name: DestinationIp

Columns.Description: Port number of the destination.
Columns.Name: DestinationPort

Columns.Description: Protocol used for the connection. Only possible value is tcp.
Columns.Name: Protocol

Columns.Description: The IP address of the remote end of a connection is included in the RemoteIp property. For inbound connections RemoteIp is the same as SourceIp while for outbound connections it is the same as DestinationIp.
Columns.Name: RemoteIp

Columns.Description: A JSON array of DNS questions (lookups) that were performed on the machine and resolved to the RemoteIp listed in the record.
Columns.Name: RemoteDnsQuestions

Columns.Description: A JSON array of canonical names that came back from the DNS server. For example when using traffic manager you issue a question to foo.trafficmanage.net and get a canonical name as something.myservice.com together with an ip address.
Columns.Name: RemoteDnsCanonicalNames

Columns.Description: A classification of the remote endpoint based on its ip and dns names and the corresponding Azure service.
Columns.Name: RemoteClassification

Columns.Description: Geolocation longitude. An example would be -122.12.
Columns.Name: RemoteLongitude

Columns.Description: Geolocation latitude. An example would be 47.68.
Columns.Name: RemoteLatitude

Columns.Description: Name of the country or region hosting RemoteIp.
Columns.Name: RemoteCountry

Columns.Description: Total number of bytes that have been sent during the reporting time window.
Columns.Name: BytesSent

Columns.Description: Total number of bytes that have been received during the reporting time window.
Columns.Name: BytesReceived

Columns.Description: Number of physical network connections that were open at the end of the reporting time window.
Columns.Name: LinksLive

Columns.Description: Number of physical network connections that have been terminated during the reporting time window.
Columns.Name: LinksTerminated

Columns.Description: Number of physical network connections that have been established during the reporting time window.
Columns.Name: LinksEstablished

Columns.Description: Number of physical network connections that have failed during the reporting time window. This information is currently available only for outbound connections.
Columns.Name: LinksFailed

Columns.Description: Number of responses observed during the reporting time window.
Columns.Name: Responses

Columns.Description: Sum of all response times observed during the reporting time window in milliseconds. If no value the property is blank.
Columns.Name: ResponseTimeSum

Columns.Description: Smallest response time observed during the reporting time windowin milliseconds. If no value the property is blank.
Columns.Name: ResponseTimeMin

Columns.Description: Largest response time observed during the reporting time window in milliseconds. If no value the property is blank.
Columns.Name: ResponseTimeMax

Columns.Description: Remote IP address.
Columns.Name: MaliciousIp

Columns.Description: Threat indicator detected. Possible values are Botnet C2 CryptoMining Darknet DDos MaliciousUrl Malware Phishing Proxy PUA Watchlist.
Columns.Name: IndicatorThreatType

Columns.Description: Description of the observed threat.
Columns.Name: Description

Columns.Description: Traffic Light Protocol (TLP) Level. Possible values are White Green Amber Red.
Columns.Name: TLPLevel

Columns.Description: Values are 0 - 100.
Columns.Name: Confidence

Columns.Description: Possible values are 0 - 5 where 5 is the most severe and 0 is not severe at all. Default value is 3.
Columns.Name: Severity

Columns.Description: The first time the provider reported the indicator.
Columns.Name: FirstReportedDateTime

Columns.Description: Indicates indicators are deactivated with True or False value.
Columns.Name: LastReportedDateTime

Columns.Description: The last time the indicator was seen by Interflow.
Columns.Name: IsActive

Columns.Description: Unique Id for the connection record.
Columns.Name: ConnectionId

Columns.Description: FQDN of the computer.
Columns.Name: Machine

Columns.Description: Identity of process or groups of processes initiating or accepting the connection.
Columns.Name: Process

Columns.Description: Unique agent GUID for the agent reporting data on the server.
Columns.Name: AgentId

Columns.Description: Value is OpsManager for all records.
Columns.Name: SourceSystem

Columns.Description: The name of the table
Columns.Name: Type

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the resource that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _ResourceId

Columns.Description: A unique identifier for the subscription that the record is associated with
Columns.Name: _SubscriptionId
